# Summarize and save data by Congressional District

Merge selected variables from tmd2021_cache.csv (the tmd data used in area-weights creation) with the previosly created wide weights file.

Summarize by Congressional District, data_source, agistub, and (??) marital status.

## Setup

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| output: false

source(here::here("R", "libraries.R"))
source(here::here("R", "constants.R"))

```

## Get data

```{r}
#| label: get-tmd
#| output: false

TMDDIR <- here::here("..", "..", "..", "storage", "output")
fpath <-  fs::path(TMDDIR, "tmd2021_cache.csv")
# tmd2021 <- read_csv(fpath)
tmd2021 <- vroom(fpath)
ns(tmd2021)
tmd2021 |> filter(row_number() < 20) |> select(RECID, s006, c00100)



```
